about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Passionate Engineering Technology Student
about.description: I am a passionate and skilled engineer pursuing a Bachelor of Engineering Technology with Honours in Instrumentation and Automation at the University of Colombo. With a strong foundation in automation and a diverse technical skill set, including web development, machine learning, database management, app development, UI/UX design, FPGA programming, PLC programming, IoT development, embedded systems, SolidWorks designing, and programming languages like Python, SQL, and Java, I bring a holistic approach to engineering solutions.

projects.title: QR & Barcode Generator Platfor
projects.description:
Built a web application to generate QR codes and barcodes with extensive customization. Supports multiple QR code types, batch processing, and includes a built-in scanner.

‚ú® Key Features Implemented:
üé® Design & Customization: Color customization, size control, logo overlay, border & padding, error correction levels
üî≤ Advanced QR Types: WiFi, vCard/Contact, Email, SMS, Geolocation, Event, Text/URL
üì• Export Options: PNG, JPG, SVG, PDF downloads + Copy to Clipboard
üîß Functionality: QR code scanner, validation, generation history, batch generation, code templates
üéØ UX: Dark mode, real-time preview, responsive design, animated UI

üõ†Ô∏è Technology Stack:
Frontend: Next.js 14 (App Router), React 18, TypeScript
Styling: Tailwind CSS with custom animations
Animations: Framer Motion
Libraries: QRCode.js, JsBarcode, jsPDF, html5-qrcode
Icons: Lucide React
Deployment: GitHub Pages with static export

üìä Project Stats:
30+ features implemented
Fully responsive design
TypeScript for type safety
Local storage for persistence
Production-ready deployment

üåü Why This Application is Special:
‚ú® 100% FREE ‚Äî No hidden costs, no subscriptions, no ads. All features are available without payment.
‚ú® 30+ advanced features in one place
‚ú® Professional UI with smooth animations
‚ú® Multiple export formats (PNG, JPG, SVG, PDF)
‚ú® Built-in QR code scanner
‚ú® Batch processing for multiple codes
‚ú® Dark mode support
‚ú® Open source and freely accessible

projects.title: Text to Voice Generator with Unlimited Translator

projects.title: Industrial Machine Vibration & Environment Logger DAQ System
projects.description:
Built an IoT-based real-time monitoring and automated response system for industrial machines that tracks vibration, temperature, sound, and fire hazards to enable predictive maintenance, prevent equipment failure, and protect personnel.

üìä Project Overview:
Full-stack IoT solution: ESP32 microcontrollers, multiple sensors, automated actuators, Firebase cloud storage, and Next.js dashboard for real-time monitoring, data analytics, and automated safety responses.

üîß Hardware:
Sensors: SW-420 Vibration, DHT22 Temp/Humidity, KY-037 Sound, Flame Sensor
Actuators: Cooling Fan (L298N), Water Pump (L298N), Audio Speaker (BC547), Buzzer, 4x LEDs, LCD 16x2 Display

üí° Key Features:
‚úÖ Real-time monitoring (100ms sampling) 
‚úÖ Live Chart.js dashboard
‚úÖ Firebase cloud storage 
‚úÖ Audio voice alerts for engineers 
‚úÖ Auto responses (fan on high temp, pump on fire) 
‚úÖ CSV/PDF exports 
‚úÖ Serial & WiFi connectivity 
‚úÖ Manual/auto control modes

üí° Why Valuable:
üõ°Ô∏è Safety: Fire detection with auto water pump, multi-level alerts (LEDs, buzzer, speaker)
üìà Predictive Maintenance: Early anomaly detection, vibration analysis, temp monitoring
üí∞ Cost Savings: Reduces downtime, extends equipment life, automated cooling
üìä Data-Driven: Historical analysis, compliance reporting, real-time insights

projects.title: Box Sweep Robot
projects.description: Built an autonomous robot capable of identifying and removing cardboard boxes from a table ‚Äî without ever crossing the boundary line. This challenge pushed us to combine smart sensing, precise control, and reliable decision-making into one cohesive system.

projects.title: Serandib Stay - Hotel Management System
projects.description: Comprehensive hotel booking app with transport booking, food ordering, and Sri Lanka's most beautiful places tracking features.

projects.title: GPA Calculator App
projects.description: University GPA calculator for Sri Lankan students with subject management, credit calculation, and semester-wise GPA tracking.

projects.title: E-Commerce Web Application
projects.description: Full-stack e-commerce platform with user authentication, product management, shopping cart, and secure payment integration.

projects.title: Pneumatic Product Sorting System
projects.description: Automated sorting system using Siemens PLC with 3 conveyor belts, 7 sensors, and pneumatic actuators for product detection and sorting.

projects.title: Smart 3-Level Elevator Prototype
projects.description: Elevator control system using S7-200 PLC with three floors, door interlocks, call prioritization, and queue-based scheduling for optimal performance.

projects.title: Smart Greenhouse Monitoring System
projects.description: IoT-based greenhouse monitoring with real-time environmental data collection, automated control systems, and sensor integration.

projects.title: Sign Language Detection System
projects.description: Real-time sign language recognition system with 90%+ accuracy supporting all 26 English letters and 10 numbers. Features advanced computer vision, modern GUI interface, and smart machine learning using Random Forest classifier.

projects.title: Face and Eye Recognizer
projects.description: Advanced computer vision system for real-time face and eye detection using MediaPipe. Features precise facial landmark detection and eye tracking capabilities for various applications.

projects.title: Real-Time Sign Language Recognition
projects.description: Deep learning-based ASL recognition system for 10 common gestures using MediaPipe hand landmarks and CNN. Achieves 99.37% accuracy on balanced, augmented dataset for inclusive HCI and accessibility.

projects.title: Scientific Calculator
projects.description: Advanced Scientific Calculator built using C# and RAD principles with MDI architecture. Features basic and scientific calculations, unit conversions, and temperature conversions. The main form acts as parent window with child forms for calculator and converters. Includes comprehensive input validation, error handling for division by zero, and user-friendly interface design. Demonstrates practical application of Rapid Application Development concepts in desktop application development.

projects.title: Line Following & Obstacle Detection Robot
projects.description: A sophisticated line-following robot with obstacle detection capabilities and an integrated robotic arm for autonomous obstacle removal. Built using ATmega328P microcontroller and tested via Proteus simulation. Features dual operating modes, PWM-based motor control, intelligent obstacle detection with 10cm range, autonomous obstacle removal via 4-servo robotic arm, adaptive speed control for curves and straight paths, visual & audio alerts with LED indicators and buzzer notifications, and mode switching with push-button control.

projects.title: Hotel Booking Website
projects.description: A full-featured hotel booking and management platform designed for both customers and hotel administrators. The system includes comprehensive room availability management, dynamic pricing algorithms, secure payment gateway integration, customer review and rating system, and advanced search filters. Features include responsive web design, real-time booking updates, email notifications, admin dashboard with analytics, inventory management, customer relationship management (CRM), multi-language support, and mobile-optimized interface for seamless user experience across all devices.

projects.title: Classroom Attendance & Gradebook System
projects.description: Digital classroom management solution with automated attendance tracking, grade calculation, student progress monitoring, and report generation. Features teacher dashboard, parent portal, and analytics integration.

projects.title: Automated Sweep Robot Using ESP-32
projects.description: Smart cleaning robot powered by ESP-32 microcontroller with WiFi connectivity, obstacle avoidance, and automated cleaning patterns. Features mobile app control, scheduling capabilities, and battery monitoring.

projects.title: Hand Operated Forklift Machine
projects.description: Innovative mechanical forklift design with manual operation system, hydraulic lifting mechanism, and ergonomic controls. Features load balancing, safety mechanisms, and precision movement control for warehouse operations.

projects.title: Smart Home Control System
projects.description: Comprehensive IoT-based home automation system with voice control, mobile app integration, and sensor-based automation. Features lighting control, temperature regulation, security monitoring, and energy management.

projects.title: Food Ordering Application
projects.description: Complete food delivery platform with restaurant listings, menu management, real-time order tracking, and payment integration. Features user reviews, delivery scheduling, and restaurant analytics dashboard.

projects.title: SolidWorks Conveyor Belt Design
projects.description: Professional conveyor belt system designed using SolidWorks with detailed 3D modeling and assembly. Features modular components, belt tensioning mechanisms, and motor mounting systems. Includes engineering drawings and manufacturing documentation. Demonstrates advanced CAD modeling skills and mechanical engineering concepts.
